title: Documentation
desc: You may be required to bring along your Passport or other documents confirming your right to work and address etc.

title: Connectivity
desc: • Provide a contact number in case of any connectivity issues. • Download the required software for the assessment such as Zoom, Google Hangouts and Microsoft Teams. • Ensure you have a strong WiFi connection. • Test microphone and webcam. • If required plug your device into a charging socket.  • Activate the invitation link 15 minutes early, so that you can resolve any technical  issues. • Use a headset if it helps with your audio.

title: Appearance
desc: • Dress appropriately, as if you were attending in person. • Consider your body language. - Sit straight - Minimise your movement without appearing stiff - Make eye contact. Note: This will require you to look directly at your  webcam or camera, so avoid looking at the interviewer on your screen.

title: Location
desc: • Position yourself in a comfortable, bright space. • Ensure that you will not be interrupted.
